title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6030.9 - Availability of NIJ Standard 0101.3
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6030.9 - Availability of NIJ Standard 0101.3

State Regulations
NIJ Standard 0101.3, adopted by section
6030.3
of this Part, has been
published in the form of a pamphlet by the U.S. Department of Justice, National

Institute of Justice. It is entitled Ballistic Resistance of Police Body Armor, NIJ Standard 0101.3 (April 1987). In accordance with State Administrative

Procedure Act, section 102(1)(c) and regulations adopted by the Secretary of

State, copies of NIJ Standard 0101.3 have been filed with the Secretary of

State, the New York State Legislative Library and at the 12 Supreme Court

Libraries designated repositories for such documents by the Chief

Administrative Judge of the Unified Court System. Copies of the standard are
available to the public and to regulated parties by contacting the Office of

Funded Program Assistance, Division of Criminal Justice Services, Executive

Park Tower, Stuyvesant Plaza, Albany, NY 12203. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6030.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
